summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Purpe's Leap Web3 Frogger dApp. Backend API fully functional with 100% test success rate. Frontend successfully compiled after fixing webpack polyfill issues and all UI components working correctly.

resolved_issues.issue: Webpack compilation errors with Node.js polyfills
resolved_issues.resolution: Fixed craco.config.js to properly handle process/browser module resolution

resolved_issues.issue: Module resolution errors for process/browser, crypto, and stream modules
resolved_issues.resolution: Updated craco.config.js with proper fallbacks and aliases

action_item_for_E1: No critical issues found. Application is fully functional for MVP testing. All core features working: wallet integration, game mechanics, reward system, and leaderboard. Ready for user testing.

backend_api_status.authentication_flow: ✅ PASS - Challenge/response working with mock signature verification
backend_api_status.token_balance: ✅ PASS - Mock PURPE balance returning $225 USD worth
backend_api_status.reward_system: ✅ PASS - Eligibility checks and claiming functional

frontend_ui_status.page_loading: ✅ PASS - No compilation errors after webpack fix
frontend_ui_status.navigation: ✅ PASS - All tabs (Game, Rewards, Leaderboard) functional
frontend_ui_status.wallet_interface: ✅ PASS - Solana wallet adapter integration working
frontend_ui_status.responsive_design: ✅ PASS - Proper gradient backgrounds and spacing
frontend_ui_status.error_handling: ✅ PASS - No JavaScript errors in console

integration_status.cors_configuration: ✅ PASS - Frontend can communicate with backend API

mocked_components.purpe_token_balance: Returns mock $225 USD worth (15 PURPE tokens at $15 each)

performance_notes.backend_response_times: All API endpoints responding within 1-2 seconds
performance_notes.frontend_load_time: Page loads within 3-5 seconds after webpack compilation
performance_notes.resource_usage: CPU usage around 88% during compilation, normal during runtime

security_notes.jwt_implementation: Basic JWT token system working for session management
security_notes.cors_policy: Configured to allow frontend domain access
security_notes.wallet_authentication: Mock signature verification - needs real implementation for production
